item.description:
1. ElevenLabs’ AI Reader app can now narrate text in 32 languages  The Verge
  2. This handy AI app can read anything aloud to you for free - now in 32 languages  ZDNet
  3. ElevenLabs’ text-to-speech app Reader is now available globally  TechCrunch
  4. This app lets you listen to any book, article or PDF thanks to AI  Android Authority
  5. OPINION - AI voices are better than audiobook readers. I'm a fan.  Yahoo News UK
